name: Ibis Calais Tunnel Sous la Manche

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked this hotel because we would be arriving in Calais after 10pm and we just needed a bed until our Eurotunnel crossing the next morning. It was cheap and I was expecting it to be very basic, but we were pleasantly surprised. The check-in was so quick and easy and the lounge/bar/restaurant area was large and comfortable. We had a nightcap and the staff were all very friendly.
reviews.title: Exceeded our Expectations

reviews.text: The room itself was a decent size, clean and with a good shower with plenty of hot water. The double bed was large and very comfortable and we were able to control the temperature in the room. It was very quiet and the free wifi and parking were greatly appreciated. We would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Good value and unexpected quality
The ideal stopover near the tunnel!
reviews.text: Clean comfortable rooms,ideal when travelling with grandchild.Staff courteous and efficienr.Dinner ..a weakness. If you are used to good french restaurant meals..you may be a little disappointed...menu a bit stereotypical of low cost catering. Breakfast on the other hand is really good! Interesting slant with buying wine...you get the bottle and only pay for what you drink. Wine selection poor and not representative of France.However this hotel is good value for money!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Use this hotel often when going to the continent and every time when returning. The friendly and helpful staff speaking English are a great asset. The restaurant is reasonable for snack type meals and offers a good breakfast from early morning. The rooms have always been clean with a super shower. Sound proofing is very good, essential in a hotel that has checking in and out all 24 hours. There is a 24 hour fuel station 200 yards away.
reviews.title: Very useful location.

reviews.text: Outstanding, friendly, enjoyable easy reach from the ferries and Euro Tunnel.
reviews.title: Ibis hotel Calais

reviews.text: Arrived quite late at night, but checked-in quickly. Free wi-fi worked well and the bed was tolerably comfortable. The shower room is rather curious, but everything worked as it should. Breakfast was also perfectly adequate, although a little chaotic. All of the staff was courteous and efficient. Hotels around the tunnel are less good value than others in northern France, but the convenience of this one makes up for that.
reviews.title: Good stopover .... not luxurious
NEW YEARS EVE 2012
reviews.text: Stayed here often on our way into France, great hotel, great staff and Ideal for Eurotunnel. Have stayed the last two New Years Eve's and though the Hotel restaurant was closed we were happy with our stay.

reviews.title: All most there!!!!
reviews.text: Breakfast was very nice but very sweet (I thought) for the adult pallet, and for the price charged I think it would have been nice to have a mild or cream cheese and a boiled egg on the menu. Heres hoping I can give you a Exellent rating next year.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The ibis hotel is very convenient for the Channel Tunnel. Our check-in was quick and efficient; the bedroom very clean and comfortable and the whole price was good value for money. Being Brits, it would be nice if there was a full English breakfast option as well as continental - particularly as we were setting off on a long drive down through France, but the food available was very pleasant.
reviews.title: Useful stop over

aka: Ibis Calais Coquelles Tunnel Hotel Coquelles
description: The Ibis Coquelles Tunnel hotel benefits from an exceptional location. Next to the Channel Tunnel and the Cité Europe shopping centre, it is 10 min by motorway from the Car Ferries terminal and 5 min from Calais Frethun TGV railway station. The hotel has 86 air-conditioned rooms. It offers a restaurant, a bar serving snacks 24/24, closed free and guarded parking, a meeting room and Wifi wireless Internet access for guests on a business trip.
